name: Halloween Escape (Zane Ronald Talbot)
description:
This game was made by myself and two other designers for a Uni project. It's a top-down stealth arcade game that involves a masked protagonist gathering all her little friends at the orphanage in order to take them out for trick-or-treating on Halloween evening. 

The main goal is to gather friends and then take them to the exit where they will then count as points scored.

While you're playing, you must avoid the roaming wardens that will steal your friends and stop you if you get caught, and also you need to get out before it hits midnight.

Hope you enjoy playing!
